bio: A nervous devil who's too scared to even use his own powers. If he'd just relax, he could be unstoppable.

soultimate.name: Timid Boo
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Deals damage to foes at a rate of 6% every 2 seconds for 15 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to make foes' HP decrease steadily.

skill.effect: 12% Spd and 30% MM Spd boost when below 25% HP.
skill.name: Fight or Flight

name: Timidevil
